items.title: Are there numpy.linalg functions that behave like tensorflow.linalg function broadcasting over the outer dims and operating on the two inner dims?
items.body:
For example if A.shape = (100, 5, 5), tf.linalg.diag(A) will operate on the two last dims and give you shape of (100, 5).

Is there a numpy version of these kind of things?
